King_Caspar.description: King Caspar is one of the Three Wise Men from the biblical story.
King_Caspar.more_info: He is traditionally depicted as the king who brought gold as a gift.

Turban.description: The turban is a traditional head covering worn in many cultures.
Turban.more_info: It is made of fine silk and decorated with precious stones.

Gemstones.description: The gemstones in the jewelry are precious stones of various colors.
Gemstones.more_info: They include rubies, emeralds, sapphires, and diamonds.

Necklace.description: The necklace is made of gold and adorned with precious gemstones.
Necklace.more_info: It features an intricate design with multiple layers.

Cavalier_hat.description: The cavalier hat is a wide-brimmed hat with elaborate decoration.
Cavalier_hat.more_info: It features ostrich feathers and gold trim.

Ring.description: The ring is a piece of jewelry worn on the finger.
Ring.more_info: It is crafted from precious metals like gold or silver.

Doublet.description: The doublet is a fitted jacket worn by men in the Renaissance.
Doublet.more_info: It is made of fine fabrics like silk, velvet, or brocade.

Incense_Pot.description: The incense pot is used for burning aromatic substances.
Incense_Pot.more_info: It is typically made of metal with decorative elements.

King Caspar.description: One of the three magi who came to worship the Christ child.

Incense Pot.description: The golden pot represents an incense pot, a gift for Jesus.

Blue garment.description: Fantasy costume with elements from 17th century clothing.
Blue garment.name: Blue garment

Young boy.description: Endearing tronie of a young boy in fantasy costume.
Young boy.name: Young boy

Red ostrich feather.description: Symbol of elegance and luxurious extravagance.
Red ostrich feather.name: Red ostrich feather

Gilt garment.description: Ornately decorated with silver gilt embroidery.
Gilt garment.name: Gilt garment

Dom Miguel.description: Member of the Congolese elite with powerful expression.
Dom Miguel.name: Dom Miguel

King_Caspar: King Caspar is one of the Three Wise Men from the biblical story.
He is traditionally depicted as the king who brought gold as a gift.
Turban: The turban is a traditional head covering worn in many cultures.
It is made of fine silk and decorated with precious stones.
Gemstones: The gemstones in the jewelry are precious stones of various colors.
They include rubies, emeralds, sapphires, and diamonds.
Necklace: The necklace is made of gold and adorned with precious gemstones.
It features an intricate design with multiple layers.
Cavalier_hat: The cavalier hat is a wide-brimmed hat with elaborate decoration.
It features ostrich feathers and gold trim.
Ring: The ring is a piece of jewelry worn on the finger.
It is crafted from precious metals like gold or silver.
Doublet: The doublet is a fitted jacket worn by men in the Renaissance.
It is made of fine fabrics like silk, velvet, or brocade.
Incense_Pot: The incense pot is used for burning aromatic substances.
It is typically made of metal with decorative elements.
